title.rendered: 2017 Brand New Conference: Registration Closing Soon

content.rendered:
Next Thursday, September 7, is the last day to register online — for both tickets and webcast — for the 2017 Brand New Conference. You will have all day and all night to do so.

For those interested in the webcast: Please note that there are absolutely ZERO registrations accepted after Thursday.

For those interested in attending in person: Unlike past years, we will NOT be selling tickets at the door, so this is your last chance to register. Thinking of you, various persons who have called us over the years from the airport on Wednesday asking if there are still tickets because they booked all their travel but forgot to buy tickets. True story.

Lastly, as you may have noticed… posting on Brand New has been intermittent this week and will continue through next week as preparations for the conference take over our lives.
